Uses of Package
retrieval.dist

  • Packages that use retrieval.dist 
    Package Description
    retrieval.client
    Package of client classes
    retrieval.client.message  
    retrieval.dist
    Package of distributed classes (xml messages)
    retrieval.indexer
    Package of indexer classes

  • Classes in retrieval.dist used by retrieval.client 
    Class and Description
    MultiServerMessageResults
    Message for XML results Many servers will send this message to a central server (similar pitcures).
    MultiServerMessageSimilarities
    Message XML for similarities A central server will send information of request picture to each server.
    ResultsSimilarities
    A result object which contains: -A list of ordered similar pictures -A list of server state -Total number of pictures indexed on all server (available)
  • Classes in retrieval.dist used by retrieval.client.message 
    Class and Description
    Message
    Force to implement method for XML message In practice, each class MessageX which implements Message should implement a constructor: MessageX(Document xml) so that client and server can read/write MessageX from/to XML.
    RequestPictureVisualWord
    A map between a NBIQ and a NBTSUM for a visual word
  • Classes in retrieval.dist used by retrieval.dist 
    Class and Description
    Message
    Force to implement method for XML message In practice, each class MessageX which implements Message should implement a constructor: MessageX(Document xml) so that client and server can read/write MessageX from/to XML.
    NotValidMessageXMLException
    A xml message exception
    RequestPictureVisualWord
    A map between a NBIQ and a NBTSUM for a visual word
